titleInfo.title: Is Who you Ask Important? Concordance Between Survey and Registry Data on Medication Use Among Self- and Proxy-Respondents in the Longitudinal Study of Aging Danish Twins and the Danish 1905-Cohort Study
The Journals of Gerontology: Series A

bibliographicCitation.mla: Oksuzyan, Anna, Sauer, Torsten, Gampe, Jutta, Höhn, Andreas, Wod, Mette, Christensen, Kaare, and Wastesson, Jonas W. “Is Who you Ask Important? Concordance Between Survey and Registry Data on Medication Use Among Self- and Proxy-Respondents in the Longitudinal Study of Aging Danish Twins and the Danish 1905-Cohort Study”. The Journals of Gerontology: Series A 74.5 (2019): 742-747.
